name: Pool Ball
description:
Welcome to the Pool Ball Billiards game! Pool ball billiards is a nice little game of pool, both support single offline playing and against other real players online, now it's totally free!

Game Features:
- Support 8 ball and 9 ball pool mode
- Compete against other real players from all around the world
- Pool ball billiards online
- Support Single Player mode, you can play offline
- More than 200 levles challenge mode to play in offline mode
- Realistic physics in 2D view
